movie.title: Baby Blues
movie.plot: On a secluded family farm, a mother suffers a psychotic break due to postpartum depression, forcing the eldest son to protect his sibling from the mother they have always known and loved.

events.title: Andrea Yates drowns her five children in the bathtub
